title: Traffic flow through an intersection part - d

content.question: What is the average rate of change of the traffic flow over the time interval <math> <mrow> <mn>10</mn> <mo>≤</mo> <mi>t</mi> <mo>≤</mo> <mn>15</mn> </mrow> </math> ? Indicate units of measure.

topic.text: 2.1: Defining Average and Instantaneous Rates of Change at a Point
